item.title: DataSlicer - DataFrame for Excel
item.description: Introducing DataSlicer Add-In: Advanced Data Analysis in Excel DataSlicer brings over a hundred functions from the pandas DataFrames right into Excel, enhancing your data analysis capabilities. As an early prototype, we’re actively seeking feedback to refine its features and functionality. As we continue to enhance the user experience, we’re also in the process of adding new functions and refining our API. We would appreciate your insights and suggestions; please drop us a line at info@adaptiverisk.
